items.title: Senior Software Engineer, Core & Data
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=4, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=28, ruby=0, apple=24, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Senior Software Engineer, Core & Data at Simon Data

New York City, Remote · Full Time
Skills
Python, Data Visualization, Hadoop, Machine Learning, SQL, Amazon Web Services, Amazon S3, Amazon Redshift, Data Engineering
Compensation
$95K–$175K
0.1%–1.0%
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

Job Description

Successful engineering teams are built on trust and purpose. At Simon Data we take that literally. We take pride in what we do every day and how we do it. Providing great software to our customers is rewarding and energizing. We've found a rapidly expanding sweet spot in marketing software and are diversifying our engineering team to keep up with the demand.

New engineers are welcomed into a team of smart and passionate engineers who love data and writing pragmatic code. We believe that you code better when you know how your work connects to the product and our clients. We also believe that you code better when you're surrounded by other engineers who want you to succeed. This attitude is core to our values.

As a Core & Data Software Engineer, you'll be exposed to the core of our software and the data it keeps. From your first day on the job, you'll have the opportunity to:

- Interface with data from dozens of clients, each of which have upwards of a terabyte of data (SQL technologies).
- Own the build out our data pipe, aggregating data from both structured and unstructured sources (Hadoop, Spark, HDFS, EMR, Redshift).
- Scale and optimize our client facing data warehouse that provides real-time interactivity across millions of rows of data (Redshift, Elasticsearch).
- Lead development of statistical models and predictive technology to improve our experimentation and segmentation tooling (Machine learning, D3).
- Develop critical features to in our python software stack.
- Collaborate with an engineering team who is passionate about quality, staying ahead of the curve, and teamwork.

Our clients rely on us for accurate data and availability. Making mistakes in our business has direct effects on our clients' customers. We take both of these facts very seriously. At odds with this, Simon embraces the startup ethos of keeping lean and focused. We move quickly (continuous deployment) and emphasize experimentation to test hypotheses. To help us keep a high bar of quality, you'll bring a mindset for creativity and fault tolerance to your work every day.

Simon's engineering team is distributed across four states; we welcome engineers working at our New York City offices as well as remote employees.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability.

We'd love to meet you and learn more about your career goals.

items.title: X-Team: iOS Developer
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=2, mobile=31, go=14, nodejs=27, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=22, java=2, gamedev=0, php=10, embedded=0, frontend=20}
items.content:
iOS Developer

Posted May 29

X-Team
Headquarters: Remote
https://x-team.com/remote-ios-developer-jobs/?utm_source=weworkremotely&utm_medium=board&utm_campaign=wwr-q4-18
View all X-Team jobs →

About X-Team

“Motivated developers, ready to join your team.”

X-Team is an international company founded in Melbourne, Australia that helps companies scale their development teams by providing them with extraordinary teams of developers from around the world.

We are 100% remote and believe in building a world where developers can have access to an environment of growth and incredible opportunities regardless of where they live.

We are also a community of people dedicated to unleashing our potential every day. We’ve fostered a unique, active lifestyle and culture around this idea that continues to attract thousands of developers to apply every day.

What separates us from our competition is the level of attention and care we give our developers compared to other more "talent"-based solutions. We proactively support them, fund their learning and growth, connect them in roaming hacker houses around the world, and give them a remote environment that motivates and inspires them on a daily basis. While other companies simply place and drop their talent, we provide unified teams of developers centered around the same beliefs, values and lifestyle.

We're uniquely situated to help shape how companies grow their businesses in the digital age and aid them in being able to do so properly with the right people.

About You:
The right individual will be self-driven. Someone who cares about maintainability of the code, automation, deployment processes and how to enable innovation through fostering a growing culture of Open Source. You will go beyond just coding and help to shape the engineering culture and best practices.

Most important:
- 3+ years of experience in mobile iOS Development
- Experience with Objective-C, CSS, Javascript, HTML
- Experience with JSON, XML, SOAP, REST
- Experience with server side technologies (Java, NodeJS, PHP)
- Experience storing and indexing data
- Knowledge of Swift and Xcode
- Code optimization and performance improvements
- Write well designed, testable, efficient code

Nice to have:
- Experience with working remotely
- Familiar/involved with open­ source projects

Personal:
- Independent, self-motivated
- Fluent in English, written and spoken
- Proven track record of always learning and growing.
- Proactive attitude
- Possess a spirit of generosity

Perks:
- Get the chance to work with big brands like Riot Games, Fox Broadcasting, Kaplan Inc., etc.
- Live and work in one of our roaming hacker houses (X-Outposts) around the world. http://x-outpost.com
- Work from anywhere as part of a community of digital nomads.
- Join our vibrant community, filled with opportunities to learn new skills together in study groups, join clubs (photography, gaming, etc.) and get free camera equipment/games/conferences/courses/massages/etc., charitable fundraisers, fitness & yoga programs (+gym membership), etc. This is the community to be in if you're a remote developer.
- We’ll provide up to $2,500 in funding for your learning and growth through our Unleash program, which provides opportunities to unleash your potential through initiatives that help you grow as a developer and explore your passions more each day. (http://x-team.com/unleash)

FAQ:
Who is X-Team meant for?
- Any freelance developers with experience working on high-scale, remote teams and projects with a motivated, proactive attitude and compassionate, team-player heart. If you've worked with freelancing platforms before, that's not what we are. X-Team is a community of all likeminded people, carefully chosen to ensure we are able to create an environment of the most motivated people in the world who come together to unleash their potential. What we've created is truly special and not a faceless platform. X-Team is where developers go to feel truly at home together, while becoming more motivated than they've ever been.

What are you hiring for right now?
- We are hiring for PHP developers to fill some exciting new opportunities we have. We're also hiring for a variety of other skills, such as React, React Native, Cryptocurrency/blockchain, Node.js, Salesforce, DevOps, and Golang.

Will I get a job immediately after applying?
- If your skills, experience and values align with a current opening we have, your chances of getting hired immediately are high. If we discover you're qualified but all opportunities have been taken, we'll continue to work with you to help you get a role in X-Team. The key is having the most relevant, in-demand skills when you apply.

What kind of opportunities do you provide?
- We provide full-time opportunities that last, on average, for 10 months. After your role ends (and so long as you've performed well), we continue to give you work internally with us until we find you a new opportunity. This ensures that X-Team can be a stable work option for you as a freelancer.

Apply for this position

Apply here: https://x-team.com/remote-ios-developer-jobs/?utm_source=weworkremotely&utm_medium=board&utm_campaign=wwr-q4-18

items.content:
About
-----
We are Sonicjobs, a revolutionary Virtual Recruiter that is changing the way people find local jobs and candidates. Every day we help hundreds of managers hire the right people for their business and people find the right job, instantly. Our apps combine the skills of a recruiter with the power of an online job board.

The role
--------
We are currently looking for an iOS Software Engineer to join our team and contribute to the evolution of our fast growing platform. The person covering the role is passionate about programming, knowledgeable about design patterns, curious about experimenting the best mobile interaction solutions and the most efficient mobile architectures. We are a distributed team and therefore an extremely good attitude to communication is also needed.
You'll be working on a mobile app powered by machine learning logic. We use agile methodologies and release frequently.

Skills
---------------
* Strong knowledge of iOS SDK, Swift
* Apps deployed to the iTunes Store
* Strong understanding of design patterns and Object Oriented Programming
* Solid knowledge of iOS UI/UX design principles, patterns and best practices
* Solid knowledge of Auto Layout, Storyboards, XIBs
* In-depth experience of working with RESTful APIs
* Capable of writing robust, clean code
* Experience working in an Agile Scrum environment and collaborative tools (e.g Jira)
* Understanding of build processes and CI tooling (e.g. Jenkins, Fastlane)
* Experience with Instruments and advanced debugging
* Experience with the iTunesConnect release process
* Experience with Unit/UI testing (e.g. XCTest, Appium, Nimble, OHHttpStubs)
* Knowledge of Objective-C is a plus
* Excellent communication skills

Opportunity
-----------
We are an easy going and focused startup team iterating on a validated and promising idea currently backed by a set of successful investors with a long experience in the sector. The platform will soon be scaling worldwide.
We are based in London, Finsbury Square.
This is a full-time permanent position.

items.title: Kickass iOS developer - Build cool stuff with seez at Seez (Beirut, Lebanon)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=22, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=12, ruby=0, apple=16, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=5}
items.content:
About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Senior, Lead
Role: Mobile Developer
Industry: Machine Learning, Marketplace, Mobile Application
Company size: 11-50 people
Company type: VC Funded

Technologies

iosswiftobjective-c

Job description

Be a part of a growing startup and join us in changing how people buy cars

We at seez, are looking for a kickass ios developer. Preferably someone with swift experience, but we understand that a good obj-c dev can easily transition to swift as that is 100% of our code right now.

You will be a part of a distributed team in the middle east and europe, with possibility to work anywhere in the world, though we would love to have you at one of our offices. Your role will be to help make a great product that many people will use and love. You will have freedom, you will be challenged, you will not be shut down due to bureacracy, your voice will be heard. Note that this job listing is preferably for someone located in Beirut to fill up our office there, however if you are exceptional, we will consider otherwise. We are not looking for a freelancer. If you are further than +/-  3 timezones from UTC+1, please don't apply, we highly value communication, you are not a code monkey

We use slack extensively and employ very little hierarchy, you are free to speak your mind, come up with ideas and be a part of our community. Even though Seez is a startup, and funds are limited, we value our employees highly and acknowledge that a great developer should be paid a competitive salary

 

Our ideal candiate has the following characteristics

  • A passion for writing first-class frontend code.
  • A minimum of 4 years of experience as a iOS developer. Your education is less important than your ability to challenge yourself and write code (We’d rather see a beautiful GitHub profile than a fancy degree).
  • You care greatly about code quality.
  • You take pride in what you do, but welcome feedback.
  • Prior experience in working with Scrum and, or Agile methodologies.
  • Good communication skills and willingness to work in a team.
  • Speaks english extremely well
  • A lot of good ideas and are constantly following the latest trends and ways.


We value growing our team and there will be plenty of oppurtunities for you to jump into our other projects and get familar with for example machine learning or developing an API

If you're interested

Send a few words about yourself and why you’re a right match for the position along with your CV.

Apply now
Ask a question

About Seez

Seez was founded in 2016 and in June 2018 got funded with $1.8M. Seez  develops and maintains the app Seez R, currently available in the United Arab Emirates. Our main vision is to ease the time spent for consumers to find their dream car, mostly through visibility, aggregation and automation.

We heavily focus on software and most of our team members are software developers or coming from math related fields.

Benefits

  • Work anywhere
  • Unlimited Paid Vacation
  • Competitive salary
  • Be a part of a community
  • Heavy start-up culture in a stable organization
  • Paid coworking space (if remote) or office
  • Strong peers to learn from
  • This perk is only here to have an even number of perks

items.title: Senior iOS Engineer at Follow Up Boss
tags: DBG:surround``3N( OR(feasibl,OR(consid,consider),option,occas,opportun,possibl,abil), OR(3N(remot, work),telecommut,2N(work,home)) ) NOT OR(regularli, abracadabra)

items.content:
About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Senior, Lead
Role: Mobile Developer
Industry: Computer Software, Real Estate
Company size: 11-50 people
Company type: Private

Technologies

swiftmvvmreact-nativecore-dataobjective-c

Job description

Who Is Follow Up Boss?

  • We’re a SaaS solution for real estate teams to better manage their leads.
  • We’re a bootstrapped, profitable company started back in April of 2011
  • We’re a remote company with a mostly US-based team
  • We don’t just claim to be customer-centric - we live it:https://www.facebook.com/followupboss/reviews

    Checkout our video on how we work: https://followupboss-1.wistia.com/medias/kc5ows18dj

    Our mobile apps:
    iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/follow-up-boss/id966131499?mt=8
    Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.followupboss.fubandroidclient&hl=en

Why Would You Want To Work Here?

  • We’re a young, ambitious company who only answers to our customers
  • Opportunity to have a big impact on our growth and your career
  • No red tape or pointless meetings
  • Competitive base salary, health/dental insurance and 20 days paid holiday

This Role Is For You If…

  • You would describe yourself as patient, empathetic and having a good sense of humour
  • You’re independent, self-motivated and can stay efficient and productive without someone looking over your shoulder all day long
  • Superb written and verbal skills (with a professional yet fun demeanor)

Your qualifications:

  • Self motivated and proactive mindset.
  • Remote work experience is considered an asset.
  • Based in the USA, quiet home office with fast internet.
  • Expert in Swift., familiarity with Objective-C a plus.
  • Expertise in package management systems (e.g. CocoaPods and Carthage).
  • Experience with core iOS technologies including UIKit, Auto Layout, Grand Central Dispatch, ARC, push notifications, and others.
  • Experience submitting an app to the AppStore, managing certificates, and navigating the app review process.
  • Strong understanding of threading and asynchronous programming
  • Experience with MVVM architecture.
  • Experience writing unit tests.
  • Experience with Core Data.
  • Experience using Instruments.
  • Familiarity with functional reactive programming (FRP) a plus.
  • Familiarity with a reactive framework like ReactiveSwift or RXSwift a plus.
  • Experience with hybrid app development a plus (e.g. React Native).
  • Expertise in version control systems (git).
  • Proven ability to create/contribute to robust commercial applications.
  • Exceptional time management skills.
  • Attention to detail and commitment to quality.
  • Security conscious.
  • Successful track record of working remotely.

Your responsibilities will include:

  • Help drive mobile development forward, improving the quality of our mobile apps and the experience our users get from them.
  • Mentor other team members.
  • Monthly customer hero day (spend a day on the front lines once per month to truly understand our customers).

30 Day Targets:

  • Become familiar with our mobile apps (iOS and Android) and their codebases.
  • Become familiar with our API, which the mobile apps communicate with.
  • Pair with mobile engineers to gain knowledge about the system and how we work.
  • Improve the new hire onboarding process, by being a part of it.

60 Day Targets:

  • Take part in improving the email features for our customers daily workflow
  • Building and releasing our integrated calling solution on mobile (we use Twilio)

90 Day Targets:

  • Assist in improving the performance of both iOS and Android apps.
  • Continue improving our iPhone app to be a 5 star experience for our customers.
  • Engage with customers and work to better drive users to newer versions of our mobile apps.

Our Core Engineering Values

  • Teamwork
  • Communication
  • Code Quality
  • Focus and Prioritization
  • Customer Driven
  • Leadership Qualities

If this sounds like a great fit we would love to hear from you,.

We're not accepting applications from agencies. 

Apply now

About Follow Up Boss

Our CRM is quite powerful under the hood and allows many various services to integrate with us through our API. Working here, there are always interesting problems to tackle. For example, we monitor tens of thousands of email mailboxes and process emails in the hundreds of millions. 

Benefits

  • Fully Remote
  • Competitive Salary
  • Health and Dental
  • 20 days paid holiday
  • Monthly gift cards for coffee, books, food, charity, fitness and more

items.content:
High response rate

This company responds to the majority of applications it receives.

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Mobile Developer
Industry: Architecture, Construction, Design
Company size: 11-50 people
Company type: Private

Technologies

ioscocoaobjective-cswiftxcode

Job description

WHAT ARE YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:

You will lead development of the app and have the ability to write highly performant code. You will rapidly prototype and work closely with our designers to iterate through multiple phases of user testing, while also working closely with developers across all teams (particularly the cloud devs).

As an iOS Engineer, you will tackle difficult and interesting challenges for the iOS app with enthusiasm. Particularly related to:

  • Creating real-time collaboration and markup software for construction documents.
  • Work closely with the other Bullclip clients to ensure the functionality is consistent and integrates with all platforms.
  • Participation in design workshops and feature kick-offs to ensure we are working towards an achievable development goal.
  • Build and iterate quickly on new features to optimise user value as quickly as possible.
  • Building slick and responsive UI that can handle millions of user-generated data points (like photos and annotations)
  • Utilizing native iOS tools to develop an experience that can effectively replace pen and paper workflows (both iPad and iPhone) for an industry that desperately needs it.

WHAT YOU WILL BRING TO DRAWBOARD:

Proficient mid-level to senior developer with a passion for building functional and high quality software. 

  • At least three years iOS experience.
  • Experience with Swift.
  • Experience with Xcode.
  • Experienced senior developer (or very talented mid-level) who has strong knowledge of system architecture.
  • Worked in a collaborative environment prior to this that demonstrates an ability to work well in teams and have one or more quality apps on the App Store.
  • Working knowledge of complex mathematics (particularly around transformation matrices).
  • Extensive experience with Cocoa Touch Framework.
  • A passion of modern design patterns.
  • General experience developing responsive asynchronous apps.

Bonus points if you have:

  • Experience with Objective C.
  • Android development experience.
  • ReactNative development experience.
  • Prior experience working at a startup.
  • A degree in computer science or mathematics.

WHAT WE CAN OFFER YOU:

  • A competitive salary
  • Remote working arrangements
  • The opportunity to lead a growing mobile team
  • A talented team of  passionate technical people
  • An easy-going, social environment. You really need to see the office and meet the people!
  • A rare chance to develop for the latest Apple hardware, particularly around touch and Pencil.
Apply now
Ask a question

About Drawboard

Drawboard is a Melbourne based company that specialises in developing powerful, simple and collaborative PDF technologies. Our flagship product, Drawboard PDF, has enjoyed great success and global adoption on the Windows platform, and we are busy developing a real-time collaboration platform, Bullclip, tailored for Design and Construction projects. The Bullclip platform currently includes a Web app, a UWP app and an iOS app developed with a focus on touch and pen technologies.  

Drawboard is a nimble company (less than 20 people) with ambitions to grow and be a key player in the construction technology space by developing fast, innovative and easy to use products designed with the user top of mind.

People enjoy working here because we're working on something meaningful and industry changing, have lots of creative freedom and enjoy working within a talented team.

Benefits

  • Flexible time and hardware arrangements
  • Mobile and Web App Development
  • Relaxed startup culture
  • Wear what you want
  • Significant say in company matters
  • Close-knit team
  • Right in the heart of Melbourne
  • Bar fridge, fruit

items.title: VipVR | iOS Engineer | FULL-TIME | New York, NY | REMOTE ok, NYC preferred

items.content:
VipVR | iOS Engineer | FULL-TIME | New York, NY | REMOTE ok, NYC preferred

VipVR is looking to enhance the music industry by giving artists a way to personally connect with their fans, while incentivizing and rewarding online engagement. Our team is made up of music industry veterans and former McKinsey consultants, with combined experience managing 10+ successful music artists and advising 10+ fast-growing startups.

We’re currently building out our engineering team, led by a former Facebook engineer and entrepreneur, and are looking for a strong iOS developer to join us in our mission. This role is for experienced developers who can build a user interface on iOS and be responsible for a fully finished product.

You will:

- Define and implement engineering goals for iOS development

- Build a high-quality native iOS app

- Iterate efficiently on designs and features that increase engagement with users

About you:

- 2+ years of experience developing for the iOS platform

- Design and UX expertise

- Strong communication skills

- Experience with Apple's Approval & Distribution process

- Experience in a fast-paced startup environment preferred

- Excellent iOS development skills, and commitment to engineering principles

- Ability to architect engineering projects

- Passion for building quality gamified communication apps

- Can work well in a small team environment and is self-motivated

Apply: Email pranav@vipvrapp.com

items.title: iOS DEVELOPER (M/W) at grandcentrix GmbH (Köln, Deutschland)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=3, mobile=28, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=20, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=8, frontend=0}
items.content:
About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Mobile Developer, Embedded Developer
Industry: Cloud Services, Mobile, Software Development
Company size: 51-200 people
Company type: Private

Job description

Hi. Wir sind grandcentrix!

Unser großartiges Team aus über 140 Infrastructure- und Cloud Architekten, Front- und Backend Entwicklern, User Experience Designern und agilen Projektmanagern macht uns zum erfolgreichsten, kreativen Systemintegrator im deutschsprachigen Raum. Wir sind auf die Entwicklung vernetzter Produkte spezialisiert. Die Engagements, in denen wir aktiv werden, suchen wir uns sorgfältig aus, denn für uns zählt die technische Herausforderung und der Spaß an unserer Arbeit. Als Partner für führende Premium-Brands der Industrie sind wir die Köpfe hinter spannenden und innovativen Produktionen im Umfeld von Smart Home und des Internet of Things.

Zur sofortigen Verstärkung des besten Teams der Welt suchen wir für unseren Hauptsitz in Köln und unsere Niederlassung in Dortmund Dich als erfahrene(n) und leidenschaftliche(n) 

IOS Developer (m/w)

Deine Aufgaben bei uns

  • Du knackst anspruchsvolle und abwechslungsreiche technische Aufgabenstellungen unter iOS, jenseits von “yet another REST-Interface und Table View”.
  • Unter deiner Mitwirkung entstehen reichweitenstarke, tiefgreifend integrierte oder auch hardwarenahe Apps mit exzellenten UI-Konzepten, immer in höchster Qualität.
  • Du arbeitest in interdisziplinären, agilen Entwicklungsteams und verstehst dich als Sparringspartner, der unsere Entwicklung bereichert und den offenen Informationsaustausch unter Kollegen fördert.
  • Du übernimmst eine tragende Rolle in der Entstehung von innovativen, skalierenden und sicheren digitalen Produkten.

Was wir uns von dir wünschen

  • Leidenschaft für iOS-Entwicklung sowie ein abgeschlossenes Studium der Informatik oder eine vergleichbare Qualifikation mit mehrjähriger Berufserfahrung.
  • Sicherer Umgang mit Objective-C und den iOS Frameworks idealerweise auch mit Swift.
  • Ausgeprägtes Interesse daran iOS Geräten auch mal Custom User Interfaces, Animationen, A/V Kommunikation, Bluetooth Low Energy Protokolle oder zertifikatsgestützte Sicherheit beizubringen und die verschiedenen iOS Frameworks maximal auszureizen.
  • Erfahrungen mit modernen Versionierungstools und dem Prozess der Continuous Integration.
  • Eine Definition of Done, die sowohl Unit- und Integration-Tests als auch eine Dokumentation deines Codes einschließt.
  • Einen offenen und klaren Kommunikationsstil – in deutscher und englischer Sprache.

About grandcentrix GmbH

Was wir dir bieten

  • Vertrauensarbeitszeiten und eine Home-Office-Regelung, bei der du für den Termin mit dem Techniker keinen Urlaub einreichen musst.

  • Aktuelle Arbeitsgeräte und ein inspirierendes, modernes Arbeitsumfeld in attraktiver Atmosphäre.

  • Innovative Projekte, unbürokratische Strukturen und kurze Entscheidungswege.

  • Regelmäßig interne Lightning Talks, Hackathons, Kongressbesuche und Meet-ups.

  • Förderung von Weiterbildungen, aktivem Wissensaustausch sowie Mitarbeitertreffen. 

Lerne uns einfach kennen und mach dir ein eigenes Bild über uns! 

Neugierig? Schreib uns!

Wir freuen uns über deine Bewerbung. Schick uns deine Unterlagen sowie deine Gehaltsvorstellung an jobs@grandcentrix.net.

Nichts passendes gefunden?

Wir suchen immer nach motivierten Talenten. Schau dir unsere anderen Ausschreibungen auf https://www.grandcentrix.net/jobs/ an oder bewirb dich einfach initiativ.

Benefits

Competitive salary and permanent contracts
Great work atmosphere
Home office and remote work
Flexible working-hours
Softdrink flatrate, hot & cold
Open & transparent communication
Free drinks, hot & cold
Company Pension Scheme
TaxSaver Tickets and Bike to Work Plans
Sunroof, Seaview & icecream flat

items.content:
About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Senior, Lead
Role: Mobile Developer
Industry: Information Technology, Software Development, Software Development / Engineering
Company size: 201-500 people
Company type: Private

Job description

Authority Partners is looking for experienced iOS Developers to join our growing teams. Developers will work on analyzing requirements, development, maintenance, troubleshooting, as well as provide client support. They will design and write maintainable code using Objective-C, communicate with teams and clients, as well as deliver products within an aggressive schedule.  

MUST-HAVE SKILLS:

  • More than 5 years of experience actively working on iOS projects, with Objective-C 
  • Secure coding (best practices and security pitfalls)
  • Multi-threading on the iOS platform
  • Experience working with web services
  • Development Tools (XCode)
  • Experience in profiling and troubleshooting in XCode
  • Experience in Unit testing
  • Experience adopting layouts to differenet screen sizes
  • Ability to work independently and well as collaboratively
  • Excellent working knowledge of English

BONUS SKILLS:

  • Experience with iOS Design Patterns and Architecture Patterns
  • Azure Application Insights
  • Experience with build and publishing pipeline
  •  Experience using team collaboration and version control tools (preferably Git)
  • Knowledge of agile methodologies (SCRUM)

EDUCATION:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related field would be of great value, but if you’re passionate and have the experience that backs up your abilities, for us, talent outweighs degree every time.

About Authority Partners

Authority Partners isn’t just an IT company. It’s a community of global technology experts collaborating with our client partners to build enterprise solutions. Today, we are more than 200 strong and one of the Most Preferred Employers in Bosnia and Herzegovina seven years running. We are always on the lookout for talented, passionate and hardworking individuals to join our team and develop their career in software development, quality assurance analysis, program management, business analysis, etc. We are committed to helping our employees achieve their career success.

AP PERKS:

  • Remote work
  • Opportunity to work with people who are at the top of their field
  • Competitive remuneration package. We reward excellence
  • Career growth
  • Collaborative learning environment
  • Professional trainings
  • Nice perks like team buildings, recreation and sports activities, game room, rooftop parties, etc.

Benefits

Recreation and sports activities
Competitive remuneration package
Career growth
Developer-focused workplace
Game room
Healthy food
Fun initiatives, team buildings and events
Most cutting-edge technologies
Remote work
Roof-top terrace

items.content:
Lead iOS Engineer at LookFwd

San Francisco, Berkeley, Remote · Cofounder
Skills
iOS Development, Full Stack Development, Swift/Objective C/iOS/Xcode
Compensation
$0K–$80K
5.0%–20.0%
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

Job Description

LookFwd let's you see friends' upcoming trips, chat about meeting up, recommendations, or whatever! LookFwd also let's you follow your favorite celebrities upcoming trips! Think Twitter for trips! After scaling to thousands of users we are seeking a Lead iOS Developer to help us scale to millions of users.

Check us out!: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lookfwd/id1117424939?mt=8

ABOUT US
- Invited to YC for final round interview last batch - top 7% of all startups that applied (Re-applying to next YC Batch)
- Pre-Seed Funding by Founder
- Thousands of active users- growing exponentially
- Rockstar UX, Marketing, Analytics, and Business Development team
- Completed the Berkeley SkyDeck Accelerator

TEAM:
- Founder/CEO - PwC Technical Project Manager
- Founder/CTO- Mobile Dev at Visa
- PM - Engineer at Apple
- UX/UI - Mobile Engineer at Progressly
- CMO - Consumer Marketing at Vine

REQUIREMENTS:
- Capable of being LookFwd's iOS Developer and scaling the current LookFwd mobile application
- Highly productive, opinionated programmer with great product sense
- Excited to become a Co-Founder and work in an equity capacity
- Experience scaling a mobile application is a plus
- Currently located in the San Fransisco bay area or willing to move to upon raising our seed round

BENEFITS:
- Substantial Equity Compensation in a growing startup
- Ability to work remotely
- Flexible Schedule
- Work alongside talented team

About LookFwd:

LookFwd is a Berkeley-based startup that was started at the Haas School of Business, and as such has significant resources available to it as it continues to grow. LookFwd currently has multiple mentors including a former Yahoo VP Media Executive and a Y-Combinator Alumnus.

items.title: Senior C++ developer; banking, financial, or quantitative experience is a plus at Core Data
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=32, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=24, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Industry: Big Data, Developer APIs, Sports betting odds algorithms
Company size: 51-200 people
Company type: Private

Job description

Core Data has an opening for three (3) experienced senior-level C++ programmers to add to our existing team.  This work-from-home contract style position offers a full time opportunity to each developer selected for the position.

This advertisement is intended for senior-level applicants with demonstrable experience in a professional work environment.  While financial experience is not required, applicants with experience in financial-related software development or in quantitative development will receive priority over developers that do not have this type of previous experience.  Applicants will be expected to have the requisite knowledge and experience needed to create professional-quality, bug-free production quality applications.  The range of projects is split between two separate product lines currently maintained by the company.  The first collection of projects relates to a sports wagering software that produces statistics, betting odds, and supporting structures.  The second and newest collection of projects relates to the banking and finance realms.  Examples include integration with exchanges, development of buy/sell algorithms, and creation of various web services to facilitate online banking.  Many of the projects we take on are of advanced level and require analysis and planning on an individual basis in addition to code writing.

For this position, emphasis is placed on the applicant's ability to produce solutions with minimal outside help.  As this is a senior-level position, all applicants are expected to be able to write the required applications from start to finish, including design of any database queries or tables.  Design specifications will be provided for each project prior to commencement.  While actual programming ability is one of the key requirements of this position, applicants for this senior-level posting are expected to show initiative and take a practical approach towards solving real-world problems.

The projects are challenging and quite exciting, and even the most experienced of candidates are certain to learn new skills and techniques while working with our company.

Skills & requirements

  • Advanced C++ background
  • Past experience working in a senior-level posting
  • Ability to write fully-debugged, real-world applications from start to finish with minimal supervisory intervention
  • Knowledge of web services, such as REST, JSON APIs
  • Working knowledge of how web documents are structured (HTML and XML)
  • Strong investigative skills, such as ability to "figure out" an acceptable algorithm to buy/sell commodities;
  • Diverse background in customer-facing as well as B2B software;
  • Ability to design tables, indexes, and SQL queries to support the data layer of applications.  Specific experience with MySQL preferred.
  • Optional:  Working knowledge of the Qt5 C++ framework

About Core Data

First and foremost, we are a software development company owned and operated entirely by professionals with a strong technical background.  Since technology is our core focus and software is our principal product, all projects at CDS are important and recognized by the highest levels of management.

We believe in hiring the best candidates for every position.  It is for this reason that we do not restrict ourselves to arbitrary geographical locations.  Most of our staff works on a remote basis.  Our hiring decisions are based on one's abilities, not location.

The projects we take on run the gamut.  Primarily we are a data and statistics provider with an emphasis on low-latency, real-time data feeds. 

Benefits

Monthly paid time off
Competitive Compensation
Flexible hours / work schedules

items.title: iOS Developer at Dillon Software, Inc.
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=21, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=21, java=4, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
About this job

Job type: Contract
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Mobile Developer

Job description

Join an existing team of iOS developers - as well as back end services, web, Android, devops, etc. - in further feature enhancements, bug fixes, automated testing activities, etc. for our iOS application that is used by thousands of people daily.  It's a media application using FairPlay streaming and offline playback for both video and audio content.  The app also supports ebooks and comic books, so there is no shortage of exciting things to work on.

Skills & Requirements

  • Must have solid Swift programming skills.  This is not an entry level position.
  • Must have excellent verbal and written English skills.
  • Must have experience with FairPlay video and audio content, both streaming and offline.
  • Must have experience interacting with REST web services, as well as managing state while offline and synchronizing state once online again.
  • Must have excellent user experience design skills.  This is not an in-house app - we care deeply that the user experience is functional, beautiful, and "feels like coasting downhill" instead of "fighting your way uphill", to quote Gruber.
  • Must be comfortable and productive working remotely with a large team scattered across four time zones
  • Core Data experience highly desired.
  • Epub3 content rendering experience highly desired.
  • Automated user testing apparatus experience highly desired.
  • Must be a United States citizen and located in the United States.

THIRD PARTY RECRUITERS AND DEVELOPMENT FIRMS, PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT US ABOUT THIS POSITION.

About Dillon Software, Inc.

Dillon Software is a small team of highly skilled system architects, designers, and developers delivering web and mobile applications to clients in the entertainment and manufacturing industries.  Our core strengths are Java technologies and relational databases, web, iOS and Android applications.  For the right candidate, we offer challenging long-term projects, a large degree of creative input, location and scheduling flexibility, and the opportunity to interact with a great bunch of people who are at the top of their respective fields.

Based in beautiful Whitefish, Montana, we have a diverse team of remote professionals from New York to California and points in between.
